Articles.Content:
Built to haul fuel up from munar refineries, should be able to do double duty as a cargo hauler if I remove the lower central fuel tank too.

Pretty much dwarfs my existing LKO refueling depot, will have to make that bigger; sucked 'er dry!

Some stats;

Wet Weight: 190t

Dry Weight: 64t

Max Thrust: 5700kN

Payload to LMO from surface: 116t

Central Engine: "Little Mother"

Radial Engines: "Skipper"

Always welcome to suggestions/comments/criticism as this is my first drop ship. Anyone think I can make it more efficient?
Looks nice, i've been looking for some inspiration for a fuel lifter for my supply outposts between Kerbin and my off-world mega colony on the Laythe oceans.

Reminds me of something...

I love it!
May it be possible to get a craft file to muck around with it?
My apologies but I reinstalled the game and forgot to save my .craft files.... boourns.
